llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 5th): Pittsburgh to Houston

* Depart from Pittsburgh at 8:00 AM (Flight Number 3660424, $461 per person)
* Arrive in Houston at 11:24 AM (duration: 2 hours 20 minutes, distance: 1067 km)
* Check-in at a hotel that allows children under the age of 10 (e.g., Hyatt Regency Houston or Hilton Houston Plaza Hotel)

Day 2 (March 6th): Houston

* Visit Space Center Houston (duration: 4 hours, distance: 38 km, cost: $50 per person)
* Lunch stop at The Breakfast Klub (duration: 1 hour, distance: 1 km, cost: $15 per person)
* Afternoon visit to the Houston Museum District (duration: 2 hours, distance: 3 km, cost: $20 per person)
* Dinner stop at La Fish Grill (duration: 1 hour, distance: 3 km, cost: $25 per person)

Day 3 (March 7th): Houston to Dallas

* Depart from Houston at 8:00 AM (Flight Number 3673723, $461 per person)
* Arrive in Dallas at 11:49 AM (duration: 2 hours 25 minutes, distance: 385 km)
* Check-in at a hotel that allows children under the age of 10 (e.g., Omni Dallas Hotel or Hilton Anatole Dallas)

Day 4 (March 8th): Dallas

* Visit the Perot Museum of Nature and Science (duration: 3 hours, distance: 2 km, cost: $20 per person)
* Lunch stop at The Frisco Shop (duration: 1 hour, distance: 1 km, cost: $15 per person)
* Afternoon visit to the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden (duration: 2 hours, distance: 3 km, cost: $25 per person)
* Dinner stop at Fuel City Grill (duration: 1 hour, distance: 1 km, cost: $25 per person)

Day 5 (March 9th): Dallas to Pittsburgh

* Depart from Dallas at 8:00 AM (Flight Number 3691487, $474 per person)
* Arrive in Pittsburgh at 10:24 AM (duration: 2 hours 5 minutes, distance: 1067 km)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $16,100 (7 people x $2,300 per person)
* Accommodations: $8,400 (3 nights x $2,800 per night)
* Transportation: $2,500 (car rental for 5 days x $500 per day)
* Food and Activities: $11,200 (meals and activities as outlined above x $1,700 per person)

Total Budget: $38,200
